comment: Good dude, complex class but he sets you up for success, you gotta be responsible here, you'll do fine if you are disciplined with your academia. Quizzes are key, you do well on the quizzes, you will rock at least a B in the tests.

Dr. Zhigang is a solid choice. He is lenient with due dates and is very kind to students. All the assignments are just submitting code and participating in discussion boards. He is also very easy to reach. I would definitely recommend him. Very easy A!
rating_tags: Gives good feedback--Accessible outside class--Clear grading criteria
